content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day August 20, 2019 Open Source Ransomware Targets Fortnite Users August 20, 2019 The global gaming phenomenon Fortnite has a huge global user base  last reported in March at 250 million gamers  and the just-concluded Fortnite World Cup with its 30 million prize pool and an online viewing audience of over two million has certainly only added to its allure.
